CustomField.description: Defines if the loading pay transactions defined on the Interpretation Rule will be invoiced separately. If "No" then the Pay Code on the Interpretation Breakpoint will be the only pay transaction invoiced.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines if the loading pay transactions defined on the Interpretation Rule will be invoiced separately. If "No" then the Pay Code on the Interpretation Breakpoint will be the only pay transaction invoiced.
CustomField.label: Split Loading Pay Transactions
